Module mesakit.navigation.routing
Package com.telenav.mesakit.navigation.routing.cost

Interface CostFunction

All Known Implementing Classes:
HeadingDeviationCostFunction, MaximumCost, Minimum, Plus, RemainingDistanceToEndCostFunction, RemainingDistanceToStartCostFunction, RoadTypeCostFunction, SpeedCostFunction, TollRoadCostFunction, TravelTimeCostFunction, Weighted
public interface CostFunction
Cost function for determining the expense of traversing an edge.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Method Details

    • cost

      Cost cost​(Edge edge)
      Returns:
      The cost of traveling along the given edge

    • maximum

      default CostFunction maximum​(CostFunction that)
      Returns:
      A cost function that returns the maximum of this cost function and that cost function

    • minimum

      default CostFunction minimum​(CostFunction that)
      Returns:
      A cost function that returns the minimum of this cost function and that cost function

    • plus

      default CostFunction plus​(CostFunction that)
      Returns:
      A cost function that adds this cost function to the given cost function

    • weighted

      default CostFunction weighted​(com.telenav.kivakit.core.value.level.Weight weight)
      Returns:
      This cost function multiplied by the given weight

    • weightedSum

      default CostFunction weightedSum​(com.telenav.kivakit.core.value.level.Weight weight, CostFunction that)
      Returns:
      This cost function plus the given cost function at the given weight
